ISignalDispatcherMethods
 
Packagecom.crazyfm.core.mvc.event
Interfacepublic interface ISignalDispatcher extends IDisposable
Implementors SignalDispatcher

Common signal dispatcher. Can be used for listening and dispatching signals for views and models.

Method Detail
addSignalListener()method
public function addSignalListener(type:String, listener:Function):void

Add signal listener to specified object. Listens bubbled events also.

Parameters

type:String — Signal type/name/id
 
listener:Function — Function that will be called when signal received

dispatchSignal()method 
public function dispatchSignal(type:String, data:Object = null, bubbles:Boolean = true):void

Dispatches signal from bottom to top of the hierarchy.

Parameters

type:String — Signal type/name/id
 
data:Object (default = null) — Optional data that will sent with signal
 
bubbles:Boolean (default = true) — If true, then signal will bubble up to hierarchy

hasSignalListener()method 
public function hasSignalListener(type:String):Boolean

Returns true if object listens for specific signal. Otherwise returns false.

Parameters

type:String — Signal type/name/id

Returns
Boolean —
removeAllSignalListeners()method 
public function removeAllSignalListeners():void

Removes all signal listeners from object. Bubbled signals will be also ignored.

removeSignalListener()method 
public function removeSignalListener(type:String):void

Removes signal listener from object. Bubbled signals will be also ignored.

Parameters
